item.description:

case 2092://iron rock id i think case 2093: // iron rock id i think mining[0] = 3; mining[1] = 15; mining[2] = 35; mining[4] = 440;// ore you get break; and i can only identify 2 things
what are the 3 middle things the exp you get???
